text: Dave the Barbarian is an American animated television series. It was created by Doug Langdale for Disney Channel. It centers on a barbarian named Dave and his friends and family, who go on surreal Medieval-themed adventures. It aired from January 23, 2004 to January 22, 2005. The series takes place in the kingdom of Udrogoth during the Middle Ages.
